source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an atmospheric, aerial scenery shot of a city. A dense layer of fog or low-lying clouds partially obscures the buildings below. The red-tiled roofs of the city are visible through breaks in the mist.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an atmospheric, aerial scenery shot of a city. A dense layer of fog or low-lying clouds partially obscures the buildings below. The red-tiled roofs of the city are visible through breaks in the mist.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several people are walking along the city streets, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is an atmospheric, aerial scenery shot of a city. A dense layer of fog or low-lying clouds partially obscures the buildings below, while several people are walking along the city streets. The red-tiled roofs of the city are visible through breaks in the mist.
